comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Donegal Tír Chonaill places,people and friends., and we'd love to have this added to the group! lovely old shot

comment.author: 40092103@N00
comment._content: Thank you so much for posting these old photographs of Donegal. It would be great to have these in the Donegal group.

comment.author: 68849461@N00
comment._content: I love all the trees in front of the castle in this pic, I would love to see them plant more up front again. I don't like the new crazy paving they have their now, its totally unatural, you just wouldn't find that back in those days. It looks to out of place.
